subject: 🛠️ Need Equipment? Get It Without the Cash Drain
body:
Hi {name},

Whether you're launching or expanding, equipment shouldn’t hold you back.

We offer flexible financing and leaseback programs for:
- Machinery, tools, and heavy equipment
- Medical and beauty devices
- Kitchen, office, or industrial equipment

✅ No large upfront costs
✅ Fast approvals and funding
✅ Keep your working capital free

👉 Book a call with our CEO, Dr. David Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 🍔 Opening a Franchise? We’ll Fund It Fast
body:
Hi {name},

Franchise funding can be complex — but not with us.

We help new and existing franchisees secure funding for:
- Initial franchise fees
- Equipment, buildouts, and signage
- Working capital for launch

Whether it’s your first location or your fifth, we’ve got your back.

👉 Let’s talk funding strategy. Schedule your call with Dr. Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 🔁 Unlock Cash from Equipment You Already Own
body:
Hi {name},

Need capital but don’t want to sell assets?

Our **equipment leaseback program** turns your owned equipment into cash — and you still get to use it.

✅ Sell it to us, lease it back
✅ Get instant working capital
✅ Stay operational with no disruption

👉 Let’s see what your equipment is worth. Schedule a call with Dr. Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: ⚙️ Expand Smarter with Equipment Financing
body:
Hi {name},

If your growth depends on new equipment or additional franchise units, we’ll help you scale **without cashflow stress**.

✅ Up to $5M in equipment or franchise funding

You grow. We fund.
